name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor
display_help: You can dramatically reduce your core body temperature to form various armors of ice around yourself. You can protect yourself from many different damage types, and you gain exceptional resistance to Cold based attacks. However, this set offers little protection to Fire based powers and no protection against Psionics.

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Hide
powers.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. No Endurance cost. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Frozen_Armor
powers.display_help: While this power is active, you coat yourself in rock hard Frozen Armor. The hardness of the Frozen Armor offers good defense to Smashing and Lethal attack as well as reduces Cold damage. Also, Fire attacks deal slightly less damage and you can resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 12.75% strength to smashing, lethal for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Hoarfrost
powers.display_help: Activating this power covers you in a thick layer of Hoarfrost. The frost can absorb the impact from enemy attacks, effectively increasing your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Hoarfrost also grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 15.00% resistance to toxic damage for 2m 0s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Wet_Ice
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, you cover yourself in a thick coating of slick, melting ice. This makes you slippery, leaving you nearly immune to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Sleep, Slow and Knockback effects. This power also adds a slight increase to your defense to all attacks except Psionics. Wet Ice also reduces Cold damage and grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Self, +DEF(All but Psionics), +Res(Cold, Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep, Slow, Knockback, DeBuff DEF)

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Chilling_Embrace
powers.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed and damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -56.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 5s on target
-32.00% strength to recharge for 5s on target

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Permafrost
powers.display_help: Your body temperature permanently lowers to 33 degrees Fahrenheit. Permafrost gives you strong resistance to Cold damage, and some resistance to Fire damage as well. You also gain an inherent resistance to Slow effects. This power is always on and does not cost Endurance.

display_info: 22.50% resistance to cold damage for 10.25s on self
9.38% resistance to fire damage for 10.25s on self
20.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff, recharge debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Glacial_Armor
powers.display_help: When you activate this power you cover yourself in Glacial ice. The crystalline matrix of the armor has refracting properties that make Energy and Negative Energy attacks less likely to land, and acts as a lens to increase your Perception to see hidden foes. The bitter cold of Glacial Armor also reduces Cold damage and also you to resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Energy, Negative), Res (Cold, DeBuff DEF), +Perception

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Energy_Absorption
powers.display_help: Activating this power draws moisture directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw moisture from adds to your own Endurance as well as Defense to all attacks except psionics. The first foe you absorb grants the highest Defense bonus, and you can absorb up to 10 foes. In addition to Defense, Energy Absorption also grants you resistance to Slow effects. If there are no foes within range, this power will fail. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Self +End, +DEF(All but Psionics), Res (Slow), Foe -End

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ice_Armor.Icy_Bastion
powers.display_help: You channel an intense cold through yourself, doing so will significantly boost your resistance to all types of damage (except psionics), your resistance to status effects, and your regeneration and recovery rates for a very brief period. Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: Self +Res(All DMG, but Psionics), +Res(Knockback, Repel, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep), +Regen, +Recovery
